title: Bright 3rd Floor 1 Bed 1 Bath w/ office corner
posting_body: Bright and sunny 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment available located on a quiet tree-lined street in the heart of Uptown.
This third-floor unit has sprawling hardwood floor though out.
Modern kitchen has been recently updated and features quartz counters, spacious cabinets and all s/s appliances; sun drenched living room.
Bathroom features marble flooring and charming claw-foot tub.
The primary bedroom is large and spacious, while smaller family room nook makes for a great home office space!
The unit also includes washer and dryer, and off-street parking.
Steps to trendy Andersonville, Asia on Argyle, and Lawrence and Argyle red line stops.
The unit is currently under renovation and you’d be the first to occupy the unit!
Finishing touches and post-construction cleaning will be completed before your move-in date.
Non-refundable fee for credit and background check per applicant is required.
Security deposit due at lease signing; first month’s rent due at key exchange.
Please contact Tim or John at TnJ Properties for more information and appointments.
